stats.startCap: starting cap on buildings, i.e. 5 (would result in buildings being 0/5)
stats.requirements: array of requirement objects used to tell what is needed to unlock, see requirements.json model
stats.produces: array of producer objects used to tell what is produced, see producer.json model
stats.storage: array of storage objects used to tell impact machine has on storage, see requirements.json model, i.e
